entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
